derivation: or אַרְנֹןlemma אַרְנן missing vowel, corrected to אַרְנֹן; from H7442 (רָנַן); a brawling stream;
outline:
Arnon = "rushing stream"
  1. a river and surrounding valley in south Palestine, forms the border between Moab and the Amorites
strongs_def: the Arnon, a river east of the Jordan, also its territory
